snippet.title: Ruined King: A League of Legends Story | Next-Gen Trailer
snippet.description:
RISE AGAINST RUIN

A mysterious and deadly black mist is spreading from the Shadow Isles, and it’s threatening to take over all of Runeterra. Unite a party of League of Legends champions to fight back against Ruination and uncover the secrets of the mist in Ruined King: A League of Legends Story. Explore Runeterra in this immersive turn-based RPG from Airship Syndicate, now available on Next-Gen consoles. 

Stay up to date:
Twitter (@RiotForge)
Facebook (@RiotForge)
Instagram (@RiotForge)

Learn more about Airship Syndicate: http://www.airshipsyndicate.com/
Learn more about Riot Forge: https://riotforgegames.com/
